issue.title: JointCommands position field set to 0.0 causes random jerks on 32bit builds

content.raw:
I ran it on 64 bit Ubuntu on drcsim 2.2 and bug didn't happen again (after over 1 hour of runtime), so I guess it's 32bit OS specific. 

This explains to me why nobody else have noticed it. Bug troubled me a lot, so I was surprised it wasn't already reported but now I'll just stick to 64 bit system.
